name: DesignCar
description:
Design and collect virtual dream cars by entering daily Design Challenges that stretch your creativity with each vehicle. Improve your design score by getting the most votes on your submissions across challenges. Earn tickets to enter more challenges by voting on others’ submissions from the community.

Enter Design Challenges
Complete design challenges by configuring photo-realistic 3D vehicles and accessories to showcase your unique design. Fulfill challenge requirements to earn in-game currency to have the freedom to design on your own terms.

Vote with the Community
Vote on your favorite vehicles from the community and have a say in the outcomes of their submissions. See how others have ranked immediately after voting on a submission. Earn extra tickets through voting to enter more challenges and improve your overall design score. Showcase your design by becoming a featured designer and have the opportunity to have it seen by millions of players.

DesignCar may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on https://designcar.io/

Important Consumer Information. This app:

- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game. This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- For information about how Porsche Digital collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: https://designcar.io/privacy
